reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable but can be tough. Lectures are clear and assignments are challenging.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Explains concepts very well and is always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Content is difficult, but the professor tries his best. Could improve on providing more examples.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Great at making difficult topics understandable. Her labs are well-organized.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Lectures are hard to follow and he doesn't respond to emails promptly.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer, but the reading load is heavy.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: He makes economics fun and interesting. Exams are straightforward if you study.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable, but sometimes the lectures can be a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting lectures and fair grading, but a bit slow in returning assignments.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Amazing professor who really encourages deep thinking and discussion.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Decent lecturer, but the course material is not very engaging.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Very passionate about the subject and encourages class participation.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Monotonous lectures and the grading is harsh.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Her passion for music is contagious. Assignments are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Average lecturer. The material is interesting but could be presented better.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Knowledgeable and approachable, but the workload is heavy.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Excellent professor. Clear explanations and practical examples.

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Good at explaining legal concepts, but the exams are very tough.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but the professor provides plenty of resources to help you succeed.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Dynamic and engaging. She brings real-world examples to every lecture.
